an8.73:5.5.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:5.5.en: ‘Oh, if I’d only [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to eat a meal of alms-food, I’d focus on the Buddha’s instructions and I could really achieve a lot.’

an8.73:6.5.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ upaḍḍhapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:6.5.en: ‘Oh, if I’d only [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to eat half a meal of alms-food, I’d focus on the Buddha’s instructions and I could really achieve a lot.’

an8.73:7.5.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:7.5.en: ‘Oh, if I’d only [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to chew and swallow four or five mouthfuls, I’d focus on the Buddha’s instructions and I could really achieve a lot.’

an8.73:8.5.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:8.5.en: ‘Oh, if I’d only [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to chew and swallow a single mouthful, I’d focus on the Buddha’s instructions and I could really achieve a lot.’

an8.73:9.5.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi, passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:9.5.en: ‘Oh, if I’d only [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to breathe out after breathing in, or to breathe in after breathing out, I’d focus on the Buddha’s instructions and I could really achieve a lot.’

an8.73:10.9.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti;
an8.73:10.9.en: or to [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to eat a meal of alms-food …

an8.73:10.11.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ upaḍḍhapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:10.11.en: or to [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to eat half a meal of alms-food …

an8.73:10.13.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti—
an8.73:10.13.en: or to [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to chew and swallow four or five mouthfuls …

an8.73:11.2.en: to [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to chew and swallow a single mouthful …

an8.73:11.4.en: or to [38;5;121mlive as long[0m as it takes to breathe out after breathing in, or to breathe in after breathing out …
